item.title: Tony Morrison Departs GLAAD, Launches Media Company (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Three-time Emmy Award-winning journalist, producer, host and impact strategist Tony Morrison has announced his departure from GLAAD to launch the Morrison Media Group (MMG). Morrison served as senior
